Name: Roxy Raccoon
About the game: When a self-centered, egotistical witch spreads her dark magic across the land, it is up to one raccoon to stop her! Play as Roxy, an adventurous young cub as she leaps, climbs, and rolls through four unique worlds in order to end the witch’s evil plan! Roxy Raccoon is a cute, fun-filled 3D platformer for all ages and a throw back to collectathons of the past. Help your raccoon friends as they put an end to the witch’s wicked schemes and conquer her many challenges. Freely explore four uniquely themed worlds as you delve deeper into the witch’s territory and steal her treasure! Compete in the witch’s trials and beat her at her own games, including popular sports, board games, pinball, races and almost anything that requires competition! Explore 4 Unique worlds and Experience an ever-expanding Hub-World as you unlock new areas! Sneak past enemies as you traverse through the witch’s territory, bypass her minions, and steal her treasure! Catch the Witch’s Pesky Pet Rabbits! Help your friends along your journey and make news ones along the way! Adventure in style as you unlock colorful new cosmetics to customize Roxy’s appearance. Post-Launch Content Rapid Ryan’s Arcade A brand-new area has been added to the overworld. This area includes a collection of minigames, cosmetics, achievements, and online leaderboards! Winter Whimsy A brand-new Christmas themed level. Along with this level, comes extra achievements & cosmetics. Seasonal Cosmetics To celebrate in style, many bonus cosmetics have been added periodically and hidden within the overworld. Seasons include Halloween, New Years & Valentine’s Day.
